Mayonnaise (2 tbsp) -Worcestershire Sauce (100 ml) -Braai Spice (To Liking) -Brown Sugar/Honey (3 tsp) -Strong Chutney (5 tbsp) -Olive Oil (1 tbsp)
1: Stir in a container until evenly mixed.

1: Prepare steak by rubbing with salt. -2: Transfer marinade into a container. -3: Put steak in the same container, coat with marinade and let sit for 2 hours or in fridge overnight. -4: Braai steak to desired level and baste semi-regularly. -5: Enjoy!
